xbird.util.io
Class IOUtils

java.lang.Object
  xbird.util.io.IOUtils

public final class IOUtils
extends Object

IO related utilities.

This code is ported from Jakarta's Commons-IO.

Author:
Makoto YUI (yuin405+xbird@gmail.com)
